effect.shortEffect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
effect.full: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

description.sun-moon: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
description.sword-shield: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
